Name: Trials 2: Second Edition
About the game: RedLynx Trials 2 Second Edition is a spectacular motorcycle game featuring stunning graphics and addictive gameplay! 4 game types (race, flip, wheelie, dynamic) Race: Race against other players to compete levels as fast as possible Flip: Try to make as many backflips or frontflips with your bike Wheelie: Drive on your backwheel for longest distance possible Dynamic: Navigate through tracks with various dynamic obstacles and puzzles Over 51 tracks to play Global highscores Ghost challenge. Play against the ghost of any other player in high score list Online player profiles with team, country and player statistics 25 achievements to unlock
